summary:
Day something or other in my FiftyIn50 blogging challenge and today's question is:
What things are easy for you to write about.  What things are hard. 
As someone who has written literally millions of words and curated just as many since moving in to print and publishing, it's a mute point as to what's hard and what's not when it comes to writing...
title: A Million Words

summary: Back in early June 2023, I tracked a botnet DDoS’ing Microsoft, causing serious network outages in Azure and Microsoft 365 for days.  I toot’d about it at the time:At the time, Microsoft didn’t disclose what happened or comment. Eventually, Associated Press called them out — they dumped out a blog on a Friday night, and nobody I could find from Microsoft security tweeted, LinkedIn etc the blog (which is different from other blogs, that get heavy promo by staff)...
title: Microsoft need to be transparent about customer impacting DDoS attacks

summary: Why is AWS deprecating a bunch of services all of a sudden, and what does it mean for you
title: The end of the Everything Cloud
